overview: Two best friends Riya and Asmita are living together and are involved in an intimate relationship. One day Asmita invites her old friend Rishi to come and stay with them as he is new in town and is looking for a job. Riya on the other hand has her plans and gets intimately involved with Rishi. Watching them together Asmita gets a panic attack and starts behaving abnormally. Watch Love and Lust to find out what happens next when Riya learns the truth about Asmita.
title: Love and Lust
